name: Around the Cluck
description:
Around the Cluck is a farm based survival game that puts you in the shoes of a seasoned farmer. Experience his every waking moment as he valiantly protects his precious chickens from the endless nightly raids!

Establish defenses during the day and obtain more chickens for your flock.

Protect the chickens and prevent them from being dragged away during the night.

Source code: https://github.com/zephyr9990/UE4_AroundTheCluck_GameJamGame
